Question: Rovigos CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Rovigos

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Supply chain monitoring and forecasting from end to end
- Fresh Guard solution for container tracking and temperature monitoring
- Real-time tracking of goods in transit, including position and container state
- AI-powered short-term and long-term forecasts for reduced inventory
- SaaS delivery for cost-effective operations
- Inventory Management and Distribution Management components
Summary_cn:
Rovigos

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 从端到端的供应链监控和预测
- 用于集装箱跟踪和温度监控的Fresh Guard解决方案
- 实时追踪在运输中的货物，包括位置和集装箱状态
- 基于人工智能的短期和长期预测，以降低库存
- 适用于成本效益的操作的SaaS交付
- 库存管理和分销管理组件
